issue.title: [C++] Review uses of BitmapReader in Parquet decoders
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14041](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14041). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Some Parquet decoders make use of `BitmapReader` when decoding data with missing values. `BitBlockCounter` or `BitRunReader` might actually be more efficient.
